English
After the disastrous food storm in the first film, Flint and his friends are
forced to leave the town. Flint accepts the invitation from his idol Chester V to
join The Live Corp Company, which has been tasked to clean the island, and where
the best inventors in the world create technologies for the betterment of mankind.
When Flint discovers that his machine still operates and now creates mutant food
beasts like living pickles, hungry tacodiles, shrimpanzees and apple pie-thons,
he and his friends must return to save the world.
